json.action_brief_markdown:
# MissionCanvas Action Brief

Date: 2026-02-18
Route: RIU-073 - Debug & Recovery
Primary Agent: Raptor (Debug)

## Input
Objective: Migrate all customer workflows to one AI provider
Context: Current environment is multi-vendor with partial safeguards
Desired Outcome: Decision memo with one-way-door analysis and alternatives
Constraints: High legal and reputational exposure if failure occurs

## Execution
One-Way Door: DETECTED - HUMAN CONFIRMATION REQUIRED
Next Artifact: Root-Cause + Fix Plan
Immediate Action: Identify failure point and define minimal corrective action.

## Checks
- Verify convergence completeness
- Verify reversibility before execution
- Validate first artifact quality
